channel.title: GKBC fourm
channel.description:
[center][size=40pt][font=Verdana]GKBC[/font][/size][/center]
[center]-to start of,you have to earn,mods,cms,Gmods,etc.
[ul][li]I myself or any other admins will pick mods.[/li][/ul]
1)we have a basic fourm witch can help any one at moparscape,so if you struggling please enter this fourm,and post.
2)were just making it like mopar,basicly it's the same thing.
3)we want to make our fourms a sucessfully,with members,etc.
Remember to follow all the rules,witch provide from the admins/mods/Gmods. If you want a logo,you have to prove your talent,i will not hand-pick em.
[b][center][size=40pt]Staffs so far![/size][/center]
Admins
[ul][list][li]Kan/kando2[/li] [li]I br3ndan I[/li] [/list][list] [li]Goldenshard[/li][/list]
Gmods
-none-
Mods
-none-
CMs
-none-
if you join,please post below,thank-you.[/center]
[b][center][size=40pt]Updates[/size][/center] [center]dylan changed (rep++) to (thank-yous)[/center]
http://kkl.smfforfree3.com/index.php?action=forum[/ul]
GoldenShard, Kan, Brendan Community!

item.title: GKBC fourm
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Glad to have helped mate.

[quote=“Ultama, post:5, topic:96354”]And the point of this team is???
I still prefer RaGnArOcK Coders :P[/quote]

It’s not a team, Kando shouldn’t really be recruiting. We just wan’t people to join. You really will be helped, we’ll use the best of our abilities to try and solve you’re problem(s), we’re also hoping this will turn out to be a fun community, much like MoparScape. We’re much more leniant aswell, I’m not sure that’s a good thing though.

Read full topic

item.title: GKBC fourm
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

[quote=“Ultama, post:5, topic:96354”]And the point of this team is???
I still prefer RaGnArOcK Coders :P[/quote]

I usually pick mods/admins to do more coding,but i am just saying i dont want an nooby application witch defines you what job you want,i wanan see you guys inprover and then i pick.

Read full topic

item.title: GKBC fourm
item.dc:creator: @planplan planplan
item.description:
@planplan wrote:

I Br3ndan I:

You guys really should check it out. This forum is undoubtedly gonna be good. If you need any help whatsoever, don’t be scared to ask. Also, you can post you’re tutorials here. It’ just like this forum I guess, except you’ll be paid more attention because the Moderators and members here are usually quite busy.

thank-you for the comment enzo pure,and brendan is right,we just need people to support this fourm and become a great Community!
brendan is one of the owners of these fourms,i couldent done without him.

Read full topic
